item.description: Does evil exist or is it a result of a person being so psychologically messed up that they are not able to comprehend morality? If someone is evil were they evil as a newborn baby? What caused the baby to (eventually) become evil? Was it something supernatural, just being born that way or some bad experiences? This leads us the classical psychological debate of whether nature or nurturing affects people more.
item.name: Does Evil Exist? Nature vs. Nurture and Everything In-Between
